details: Directive: I will modify `tiktoken/core.py` and incorporate BOTH features. Do NOT modify `tiktoken/core.py`; you only create `tiktoken/tests/test_feature1.py`.
Starts work on `tiktoken/tests/test_feature1.py` (tests-only for max_tokens), per Agent 8’s directive.
Ack: I will NOT touch `tiktoken/core.py`. I’ll only create `tiktoken/tests/test_feature1.py` (and `__init__.py`). Tests will pass once you land max_tokens in core.
Edit `tiktoken/core.py` to implement both features (encode updates + validation/logic).
Create `tiktoken/tests/test_feature1.py` (max_tokens tests). Also creates `tiktoken/tests/__init__.py` so tests are importable.
Create `tiktoken/tests/test_feature8.py` (return_repeated_pattern tests, including an integration test with max_tokens).
